LandingPage.title: Eiki
LandingPage.subtitle: Read and Remember
LandingPage.blurb: Sign in or sign up to get started learning English.

About.title: About Eiki
About.content1: Eiki is an English education app that lets you learn English by both testing your understanding and guiding your vocab memorization.
About.content2: With Eiki, you work through reading comprehension passages that gradually increase in difficulty. At any time, you can select a word to put in your vocabulary bank. Eiki will automatically schedule review sessions for you using a spaced repetetion algorthm. Easy words are seen less often and difficult words are seen more often.

ItemCard.questionPrompt: What is this passage mainly about?
